verses.name: Luke 7:45
verses.text: Thou gavest me no kiss: but this woman since the time I came in hath not ceased to kiss my feet.

verses.name: Luke 7:46
verses.text: My head with oil thou didst not anoint: but this woman hath anointed my feet with ointment.

verses.name: Luke 7:47
verses.text: Wherefore I say unto thee, Her sins, which are many, are forgiven; for she loved much: but to whom little is forgiven, the same loveth little.

verses.name: Luke 7:48
verses.text: And he said unto her, Thy sins are forgiven.

verses.name: Luke 7:49
verses.text: And they that sat at meat with him began to say within themselves, Who is this that forgiveth sins also?
